title: Salmon gravad lax with pickled cucumber, cucumber ketchup, mustard mayo and croûtons
description: Choose super-fresh salmon for this classic Scandinavian starter. It's perfect for a dinner party, as most of the components can be prepared ahead of time.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a food processor and a chef's blow torch.
ingredients: ½ side of salmon, about 500g/1lb 2oz, filleted, skinned, pin-boned
salt and freshly ground black pepper
